title: Perfect size 2 bedroom in a great location in Minneapolis!
posting_body: ['Perfect size 2 bedroom in a great location in Minneapolis!', 'Property Address', '3001 N 3rd St - Unit 5 | Minneapolis, MN 55411', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Housing Hub, LLC |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Another Great Listing from Essi and Housing Hub', 'This nice-looking 2 bedroom, 1 bath comes with updated appliances, plenty of closets, and roomy living and bedroom spaces.', "It's situated in 8 unit building with 24h security surveillance and a key fob entry system to ensure safety.", 'Each unit has one assigned off-street parking, a storage unit with a laundry facility in the building.', 'The neighborhood of Hawthorne is friendly and just 3 miles north of downtown Minneapolis and offers many attractions including parks, playgrounds, and sports fields.', "Sammy's Avenue Eatery is one of the locals' favorites!", 'The tenant pays for electricity only; the owner covers all other utilities including snow removal and lawn care.', 'Here are our application selection criteria for your review:', '1.', 'Clean Credit with no past due or collections', '2.', 'Good rental history with no evictions within the last 3 years', '3.', 'Clean criminal history with no felonies within the last 7-10 years depending on conviction', '4.', 'Household monthly income of 2.5 times the monthly rent verified by pay-stubs', '**Housing Hub abides by the Minneapolis Ordinance', 'No. 2019-038 Sec. 3 244.2030.', '**', 'This building is pet friendly, however, some breed restrictions and pet fees will apply.', 'Applications can be found online at <URL> and are $45 per adult.', 'This is a professionally managed building from the folks at Housing Hub.', 'Secure Online Tenant Portals makes paying rent and scheduling maintenance a breeze.', 'Housing Hub wants to provide you with a great living experience!', 'Please make sure to mention this address when leaving a message or sending a text.', 'Call or text Essi @', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing!', 'All information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed.', 'Photos are from a similar unit on site.', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $1,325.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $1,325.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
